content: As "Julie", I would likely take a humanistic approach when shopping for a car. I would research and compare different makes and models to find a car that not only meets my family's needs but also aligns with my values. I would also take into consideration the environmental impact and safety ratings of the vehicles. I would also look for good service from the dealership and negotiate the best deal possible. Additionally, I would likely ask for recommendations from friends and family, and read reviews online to get a better understanding of the pros and cons of different options. I would also consider test driving the cars to see which one feels the best to me.
